description:
Supply and installation of a new rock berm in Steveston Harbour, consisting of a 152 linear meter long structure located along the northeastern edge of Steveston island (Shady island) with marine access only.
Work must be conducted during the least risk to fish work window: July 16 of any given year until February 28. The work must be completed by September 15th, 2024.

OPTIONAL SITE VISIT: It is recommended that the bidder or a representative of the bidder visit the work site. Arrangements have been made for the site visit to be held at 12740 Trites Road, Richmond, BC on Tuesday October 31, 2023. The site visit will begin at 11:30 am PDT. Bidders are requested to meet in the main parking lot outside the Steveston Harbour Authority office.

# Rock Berm Construction Tender Announcement
## Reference: cb-758-98319302

### Amendment: 11

**Publication Details**

* Publication Date: 2023-10-25
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-17T13:00:00 (expired)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-11-20
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-09-15

**Procurement Details**

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

**Scope of Work**

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a contractor to design, supply, and install new rock berm material, including filter rocks, riprap, and filter cloth, at a site located in Steveston, British Columbia. The scope of the work includes:

* Construction of a new rock berm with a length of approximately 152 linear meters
* Marine access only
* Work must be completed by September 15, 2024

**Conditional Set-Aside**

This tender is conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more compliant bids from Indigenous businesses are received. Bidders are encouraged to register in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory.

**Optional Site Visit**

A site visit has been arranged at 12740 Trites Road, Richmond, BC on Tuesday, October 31, 2023, at 11 am PDT.

**Key Documents**

* Invitation to Tender: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23129/30003974b---invitation-to-tender.pdf
* Specifications: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23129/30003974b---specifications.pdf
* Drawings: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23129/30003974b---drawings.pdf

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Karen Dolan at DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or (782) 377-7245. 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick,
